title: Children's circle
brief_description: A quality series that brings outstanding children’s books to the screen. The stories bring alive the actual illustrations from the book, through animation and iconographic techniques. Honoured by awards at Film Festivals worldwide, these programs are the perfect bridge between video and reading.
